sentences: Kõrgus mäe tipul on üle tuhande meetri.
Tolmu kõrgus õhus oli väga suur täna hommikul.
context: The Estonian word 'kõrgus' means height, altitude or elevation in English. It refers to the measurement of how high something is above a reference point. This can be used for physical heights of objects (like mountains, buildings), as well as altitude when referring to aircraft or geographical elevations.
